snippet: On Tuesday night, a wondrous display of fashion players populated a large gallery space for the CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund dinner, which is itself the culmination of a competition for emerging designers trying to win the industry’s support.
abstract: Fashion world celebrities attend CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund dinner at gallery space in Chelsea to pay tribute to emerging designers trying to win industry's support; Greg Chait, designer of cashmere line Elder Statesman, wins top prize.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday night, a wondrous display of fashion players populated a large gallery space for the CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund dinner, which is itself the culmination of a competition for emerging designers trying to win the industry’s support.

keywords.value: Council of Fashion Designers of America
keywords.name: organizations
